net.proteusframework.core.html

Interface Context

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContextImpl

    public interface Context
    Context information used by Element.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<? extends Element> getContentElements()
      Get the content elements.
      Set<String> getDefinedAttributes()
      Get the defined attributes.

      Get the element.
      Context getParentContext()

    • Method Detail

      • getContentElements

        Collection<? extends Element> getContentElements()
        Get the content elements.
        Returns:
        the content elements. Null if not known.

      • getDefinedAttributes

        Set<String> getDefinedAttributes()
        Get the defined attributes.
        Returns:
        the defined attributes. Never null.

      • getElement

        Element getElement()
        Get the element.
        Returns:
        the element.

      • getParentContext

        Context getParentContext()
        Get the parent context.
        Returns:
        the parent context. Null if not known.

      • hasContentElement

        boolean hasContentElement(Element element)
        Test if the element contains the specified content element. If you need to check whether the information is known. Call getContentElements() and check for null.
        Parameters:
        element - the element to test.
        Returns:
        true or false. Returns false in cases when the information isn't available.

      • hasDefinedAttribute

        boolean hasDefinedAttribute(String attributeName)
        Test if the set contains the specified attribute name.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the attribute name.
        Returns:
        true or false.
